Use THETA's crackfix people. That one works perfectly.

You need to put some programs on a blocklist in your firewall (recommend Comodo Internet Security, it's free and is easy to understand, fuck Windows Firewall=P).
Add the following files found in the "Core" folder:
"activation.exe", "EACoreServer.exe", "EAProxyInstaller.exe" and "PatchProgress.exe". Probably don't need to add them all, but i did anyway. after that the game works as it's intended ;)

OK, here's what worked for me. I'm on at least 4 hours game play no problems besides the occasional frame drop.

1. Installed SKIDROW standard copy. DON'T CRACK YET
2. Removed Ethernet (or Wireless off)
3. delete activation.exe, EACoreServer.exe, EAProxyInstaller.exe, PatchProgress.exe - BEFORE CRACKING
4. CRACK - I used Theta crackfix but you could try SKIDROW's, probably nothing wrong with it, but this one worked flawlessly for me.
5. Play your game and enjoy.

I used the Thetha fix crack. It worked for me. I use Windows 7. :) 

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6474719

1. Delete ALL of skidrow's files (AliceMadnessReturns.exe, Skidrow.dll, awc.dll)

2. Copy ALL of the files in the theta crack folder. The AliceMadnessReturns.exe, awc.dll, awc.org to Alice2\Binaries\Win32, AND DONT FORGET the files from the CORE FOLDER. Copy those files (awc.all, awc.org) to Alice2\Binaries\Win32\Core.

Note: If you are getting an error messege when starting up the .exe, MAKE SURE that you're Anti Virus is letting the prosses go though
For BitDefender (What I use) Make sure to add Alicemadnessreturns.exe in the main file (Win32) to the list.

For everyone else, google a way to do so.

Make sure its put in Excluded Prosses and not just Excluded Files!!!!

Note: This Apply's to a few cracks out there (Which ever crack is giving u a error as soon as u run .exe)
